thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Dominion Energy - Entered Into 6 Separate Sales Agency Agreements

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Dominion Energy - Entered Into 6 Separate Sales Agency Agreements
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Dominion Energy Inc:
* DOMINION ENERGY SAYS ENTERED INTO 6 SEPARATE SALES AGENCY AGREEMENTS WITH DEUTSCHE BANK SECURITIES, GOLDMAN SACHS & CO, AMONG OTHERS - SEC FILING
* DOMINION ENERGY - ENTERED INTO AGREEMENTS TO OFFER UP TO $1 BILLION OF COMMON STOCK
* DOMINION ENERGY INC - NEW SALES AGENCY AGREEMENTS REPLACE SALES AGENCY AGREEMENTS ENTERED ON JUNE 30, 2017
* DOMINION ENERGY SAYS SALES OF SHARES WILL BE MADE BY MEANS OF PRIVATELY NEGOTIATED TRANSACTIONS Source text ( bit.ly/2FfDm3p ) (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
